summary: This document is a series of email exchanges from December 6-7, 2018, discussing a meeting to talk about lawmakers calling on the DOJ to explain the Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA) given to Jeffrey Epstein. The emails show coordination for a call or meeting, with one participant noting Epstein's good speakerphone.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The emails discuss lawmakers calling on the DOJ to explain the Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA) given to him. One email suggests meeting at his office because his speakerphone is good.

events.title: Discussion of Epstein NPA and meeting coordination
events.description: Email exchanges among individuals coordinating a meeting or call to discuss lawmakers demanding a probe into Jeffrey Epstein's Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA).

keyFacts: Lawmakers were calling on the Department of Justice (DOJ) to explain the Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA) given to Jeffrey Epstein.
The emails show coordination for a meeting or call on December 7, 2018, to discuss this development.
One email suggests meeting at Epstein's office because his speakerphone is good, indicating his involvement or availability in the discussion.
